entries.category: The Clone Relics, Quest of the Geonosian
entries.journal_entry_description: After finding the documents describing the Trandoshans evil plans, you need to use them to clear Ikvizi's name.
entries.journal_entry_title: Help the imprisoned Geonosian, phase II
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the great tree in Kachirho and talk to the Wookiee elder Ovarra.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Talk to elder Ovarra and show her the documents you retrieved from the Trandoshans.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to the Geonosian with the good news.
